items.title: Jeans brand True Religion acquired by PE firm, American Eagle-linked investment firm
items.content: True Religion, the Y2K-era jeans brand in the midst of a comeback, has been acquired by private equity firm ACON Investments and its partner SB360 Capital.
items.contentSnippet: True Religion, the Y2K-era jeans brand in the midst of a comeback, has been acquired by private equity firm ACON Investments and its partner SB360 Capital.

items.title: Panera Brands CEO steps down, CFO to fill in as interim chief
items.content: The restaurant company, which also includes Einstein Bros. and Caribou Coffee, has been attempting to go public over the last few years.
items.contentSnippet: The restaurant company, which also includes Einstein Bros. and Caribou Coffee, has been attempting to go public over the last few years.

items.title: Wall Street notches another win as Fed's Barr clears the way for gentler banking regulator
items.content: With Barr's resignation, a more precise image of incoming bank deregulation is forming.
items.contentSnippet: With Barr's resignation, a more precise image of incoming bank deregulation is forming.

items.title: Frontier plans new flights from JFK to big American Airlines hubs Miami, Los Angeles and Dallas
items.content: Frontier said fares would start as low as $19 for JFK-Miami service.
items.contentSnippet: Frontier said fares would start as low as $19 for JFK-Miami service.

items.title: Puma challenges Tiger Woods' Sun Day Red logo
items.content: The German sneaker and apparel company says the Sun Day Red logo is too similar to the logo that Puma has been using since 1969.
items.contentSnippet: The German sneaker and apparel company says the Sun Day Red logo is too similar to the logo that Puma has been using since 1969.

items.title: J&J says its lung cancer drug combination keeps people alive longer
items.content: Johnson & Johnson said its lung cancer regimen – Rybrevant plus Lazcluze – keeps people alive for at least a year longer than AstraZeneca's Tagrisso.
items.contentSnippet: Johnson & Johnson said its lung cancer regimen – Rybrevant plus Lazcluze – keeps people alive for at least a year longer than AstraZeneca's Tagrisso.

items.title: Online holiday spending rises nearly 9%, as deep discounts and AI-powered chatbots fuel purchases, Adobe data says
items.content: The holiday e-commerce results from Adobe are a promising sign for the retail industry, which will begin reporting holiday results in February.
items.contentSnippet: The holiday e-commerce results from Adobe are a promising sign for the retail industry, which will begin reporting holiday results in February.

items.title: BMW to install new 'panoramic' display in all vehicles
items.content: BMW revealed its new Panoramic iDrive system, including windshield-length display, and BMW Operating System X on Tuesday during the CES tech show.
items.contentSnippet: BMW revealed its new Panoramic iDrive system, including windshield-length display, and BMW Operating System X on Tuesday during the CES tech show.

items.title: Stellantis reveals redesigned Ram heavy-duty trucks
items.content: Stellantis has redesigned its large Ram heavy-duty trucks, which are expected to arrive at dealers in the first quarter of this year and will start at $47,560.
items.contentSnippet: Stellantis has redesigned its large Ram heavy-duty trucks, which are expected to arrive at dealers in the first quarter of this year and will start at $47,560.

items.title: Toyota is 'exploring rockets' with nearly $45 million investment in Japanese launch startup, chairman says
items.content: Toyota Motor is exploring the development and production of orbital rockets, Chair CEO Akio Toyoda said Monday.
items.contentSnippet: Toyota Motor is exploring the development and production of orbital rockets, Chair CEO Akio Toyoda said Monday.

items.title: Ulta Beauty names new CEO, raises outlook for holiday quarter
items.content: The beauty retailer Ulta said the leadership changes take effect immediately.
items.contentSnippet: The beauty retailer Ulta said the leadership changes take effect immediately.

items.title: UK visitors from dozens of countries will have to pay a new entry fee starting this week
items.content: Starting Wednesday visitors to the UK from dozens of countries will have to pay a new travel authorization fee before entering.
items.contentSnippet: Starting Wednesday visitors to the UK from dozens of countries will have to pay a new travel authorization fee before entering.

items.title: Winter storm disrupts thousands of U.S. flights
items.content: The Washington, D.C., area had the bulk of the day's cancellations from the winter storm.
items.contentSnippet: The Washington, D.C., area had the bulk of the day's cancellations from the winter storm.

items.title: Eli Manning says 'only one team' he'd take an ownership stake in: The New York Giants
items.content: Former New York Giants quarterback Eli Manning told CNBC he's interested in becoming a minority owner of his former team, if the Mara family is willing to sell.
items.contentSnippet: Former New York Giants quarterback Eli Manning told CNBC he's interested in becoming a minority owner of his former team, if the Mara family is willing to sell.

items.title: Sierra Space CEO leaves, as $5 billion company pushes to launch space plane
items.content: Sierra Space CEO Tom Vice left the company at the end of 2024 after 3½ years in the role.
items.contentSnippet: Sierra Space CEO Tom Vice left the company at the end of 2024 after 3½ years in the role.

items.title: Disney to combine its Hulu+ Live TV with streamer Fubo
items.content: Both Hulu+ Live TV and Fubo are streaming services that mimic the traditional cable TV bundle, offering linear TV networks.
items.contentSnippet: Both Hulu+ Live TV and Fubo are streaming services that mimic the traditional cable TV bundle, offering linear TV networks.

items.title: Lucid reports record quarterly vehicle deliveries, meets production target
items.content: Lucid Group on Monday reported record quarterly vehicle deliveries for the fourth quarter and confirmed production of more than 9,000 vehicles in 2024.
items.contentSnippet: Lucid Group on Monday reported record quarterly vehicle deliveries for the fourth quarter and confirmed production of more than 9,000 vehicles in 2024.

items.title: Comcast to launch Universal Ads in bid to win smaller advertisers over from tech
items.content: Comcast plans to launch Universal Ads, a platform meant to attract advertisers of all sizes and grab back ad dollars from social media and tech companies.
items.contentSnippet: Comcast plans to launch Universal Ads, a platform meant to attract advertisers of all sizes and grab back ad dollars from social media and tech companies.

items.title: A year after Boeing's door plug accident, the aircraft giant faces a steep road to recovery
items.content: A year after a door plug blew out of a nearly new Boeing 737 Max 9, the manufacturer is outlining the progress it has made.
items.contentSnippet: A year after a door plug blew out of a nearly new Boeing 737 Max 9, the manufacturer is outlining the progress it has made.

items.title: GM, Ford report best annual U.S. sales since 2019 as auto recovery continues
items.content: Both General Motors and Ford Motor on Friday reported their best annual U.S. new vehicle sales since 2019.
items.contentSnippet: Both General Motors and Ford Motor on Friday reported their best annual U.S. new vehicle sales since 2019.

items.title: JetBlue fined $2 million by DOT for 'chronically delayed flights'
items.content: The Department of Transportation said its $2 million fine against JetBlue was the first of its kind for chronically delayed flights.
items.contentSnippet: The Department of Transportation said its $2 million fine against JetBlue was the first of its kind for chronically delayed flights.

items.title: DraftKings tests a subscription service as it looks to offset high New York taxes
items.content: DraftKings is testing the subscription service in New York, which is tied for the highest tax rate on sports wagering in the country.
items.contentSnippet: DraftKings is testing the subscription service in New York, which is tied for the highest tax rate on sports wagering in the country.

items.title: U.S. surgeon general calls for cancer risk warnings on alcohol labels
items.content: The U.S. surgeon general on Friday issued a new advisory on the link between alcohol consumption and increased cancer risk.
items.contentSnippet: The U.S. surgeon general on Friday issued a new advisory on the link between alcohol consumption and increased cancer risk.

items.title: Rivian stock has its best day ever after EV maker reports 2024 production, deliveries
items.content: Rivian on Friday said it produced 49,476 electric vehicles last year.
items.contentSnippet: Rivian on Friday said it produced 49,476 electric vehicles last year.

items.title: Hindenburg Research shorts Carvana, calling company's turnaround a 'mirage'
items.content: The report centers on Carvana's practice of loan sales as well as the business relationship between CEO Ernie Garcia III and his father, Ernest Garcia II.
items.contentSnippet: The report centers on Carvana's practice of loan sales as well as the business relationship between CEO Ernie Garcia III and his father, Ernest Garcia II.

items.title: These airlines were the most on time in 2024
items.content: Supply chain issues and strong travel demand continued in 2024.
items.contentSnippet: Supply chain issues and strong travel demand continued in 2024.

items.title: These restaurant chains closed locations in 2024
items.content: Wendy's, Applebee's and Red Lobster were among the chains that announced restaurant closures in 2024.
items.contentSnippet: Wendy's, Applebee's and Red Lobster were among the chains that announced restaurant closures in 2024.

items.title: Horse racing is set for a resurgence, even as America's oldest track closes
items.content: No catalyst for horse racing's growth is more crucial at the moment than the revenue that comes from gambling.
items.contentSnippet: No catalyst for horse racing's growth is more crucial at the moment than the revenue that comes from gambling.

items.title: The housing market is heading into 2025 with a worrying supply trend
items.content: More than half of homes for sale in November had sat on the market for at least 60 days without going under a contract of sale.
items.contentSnippet: More than half of homes for sale in November had sat on the market for at least 60 days without going under a contract of sale.

items.title: Jeju Air plane crash raises questions about concrete wall at the end of the runway
items.content: Some aviation experts say the damage could have been minimized had the plane not collided with the concrete wall.
items.contentSnippet: Some aviation experts say the damage could have been minimized had the plane not collided with the concrete wall.
